expo.name: Agrolyfe
expo.description: Agrolyfe is leveraging on technology and real estate to connect farmers with easy access to arable and secure purpose-built farm lands for rental period of a year with opportunities to renew their land rental duration, partake in Farmers Co-operative society membership for access to both financial and technical needs.

plugins.photosPermission: The app accesses your photos to let you share them with your friends.
